com.qtplaf.library.database

Class FieldList

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtplaf.library.database.FieldList

  • public class FieldList
extends java.lang.Object
    A field list packs a list of field, its field map, the primary key pointers and the order key pointers if applicable.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas

    • Field Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getDefaultRecord

        public Record getDefaultRecord()
        Returns a record with default values from this field list.
        Returns:
        A default record.

      • getRecord

        public Record getRecord(java.util.List<Value> values)
        Returns a record created with this field list and the list of values. For performance issues this method does not validate that field-value type match. The method validateValues can be used to validate the values if necessary.
        Parameters:
        values - The list of values.
        Returns:
        The record.

      • validateValues

        public void validateValues(java.util.List<Value> values)
        Validates the values against this field list checking that all field-value types are equal.
        Parameters:
        values - The list of values to validate.
